title: Dev Server Target
description: Dev Server target options for Build Facade.

rendererTargets.description: One or more renderer targets for your project (angular projects)

mainTarget.description: The main process for your electron project (a node app)

devServerPort.description: the port where the dev server listens for changes.

outputPath.description: Path where the electron app will be build.

rendererOutputPath.description: Path where the renderer apps will be created.

package.description: Path to the package json for the electron app.
